comment:
One of the most caring people you'll ever meet. She will help any student in her class with anything. 
The material of this class was very easy in general. She gets heavily distracted and over half of all class time is spent on anything but the material. If you ask her a question after class, prepare to clear your schedule for the next hour.

Very knowledgeable in architecture, nice but sometimes tough. Appreciates creativity. No second chances really. You need to show up for class and have something ready every day, which is for most architecture-related courses anyway. You need to put in a lot of effort and have the effort documented.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Schleifer is the most caring professor! Very knowledgeable, with real-life experiences, makes lectures fun and really cares that you not only do great in her class but also in the other ones that you might be taking. Very clear in her grading criteria, and is always ready to help you and give feedback! If I could rate higher I would...
